body_html: Are you sure the function you proposed is correct? For me it returns -300, but log(sigmoid(-300)) should be a very very large negative number (which is exactly why you're getting -inf). I don't think there's a lot we can do about that.
body_text: Are you sure the function you proposed is correct? For me it returns -300, but log(sigmoid(-300)) should be a very very large negative number (which is exactly why you're getting -inf). I don't think there's a lot we can do about that.
body: Are you sure the function you proposed is correct? For me it returns -300, but log(sigmoid(-300)) should be a very very large negative number (which is exactly why you're getting -inf). I don't think there's a lot we can do about that.
